Job Title: Senior Scrum Master Oracle HCM

Location: Akron, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job#: 2023828

Job Description:

Apex Systems is seeking a Scrum Master (Senior) resource for a full-time opportunity that is 100% remote. This position will be part of the new implementation and will support the functional side of Oracle Cloud HCM Suite. This team owns and supports the Oracle applications and any related enhancements, work instructions, business process analysis, configuration, validation, and functionality.

Position: Scrum Master (Oracle Cloud HCM)

Location: Remote

Duration: long term project

***We are unable to sponsor Visa’s now or in the future***

Requirements:

 6+ years of Experience of Oracle Cloud as a Scrum Master (preferrable HCM)  2+ years of experience with Azure DevOps  Fast Formula hands on experience  Proven experience guiding business units on Scrum best practices  implementation and integration experience with Oracle HCM  Ability to work effectively under pressure and manage multiple project teams 

Responsibilities:

 Facilitate daily scrum, sprint planning, sprint demo, and retrospective meetings.  Support the implementation of Oracle Cloud HCM solutions, including profit centre accounting, planning, and group reporting.  Foster collaboration among project teams and stakeholders to ensure Oracle HCM solutions are aligned with business requirements.  Drive the adoption of Agile methodologies, promoting continuous improvement in practices and processes.  Serve as a coach and mentor to teams on Agile practices and principles, ensuring the successful delivery of projects.  Manage project risks and dependencies, ensuring they are identified, tracked, and mitigated.  Delegate Tickets across the HRIS team to ensure for timely resolution  Facilitate ceremonies and Sprints across the group  Guide and coach the current team on Scrum best practices  Manage coordination of the partners and working groups engaged in project work;  Develop and maintain a detailed project plan using Azure DevOps  Meet with team members on a biweekly basis to forecast hours  Continuously manage the budget to actuals and forecast to completion  Manage project deliverables in line with the statement of work  Record and manage project issues and escalate to the architecture consultant, where necessary  Monitor project progress and performance 

Nice to Have:

 Certified Scrum Master  Implementation experience or knowledge of Oracle Cloud Human Resources and/or Security.  Oracle Cloud Benefits Implementation Certification.  HCM Cloud modules (Time & Labor, Absence, Benefits) is a plus 

Education:

 Bachelor’s degree required with minimum 5 years relevant experience. In lieu of a degree, High School Diploma or GED and a minimum 7 years relevant experience at progressively increasing levels of responsibility is required. Relevant experience includes:
